pullRequest.title: Removed AccountRecord validation while saving credentials
pullRequest.bodyText:
Change for OneAuth
MSALCPP expects AccountRecord and Credentials to be independant of each other, so removed hard validation of AccountRecord non-null while writing credentials.

commit.message: Removed AccountRecord validation while saving credentials

nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure I understand this removal -- we still will make a single WriteCredentials call, which may contain multiple credentials
